column5: Hey all.  Does anyone have one of these and or used it?  Just looking for feedback as I have enough ice reels but it caught my eye to replace the fly reel I use because of the handle is much bigger.  Thanks all.  G
http://ontheicewithek.blogspot.ca/2012/11/product-review-new-eagle-claw-inline.html?m=1  Looks like a good product to me.  Has all the advantages of fly reel with a better gear ratio and free spool.
